entry.title: Sunday night: Rain. Temperature rising to 9 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers this evening. Rain beginning late this evening. Amount 10 mm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature rising to 9 by morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: Rain at times heavy. High 10 with temperature falling to 6 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy ending late in the afternoon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 in the morning then becoming light in the afternoon. High 10 with temperature falling to 6 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Sunday 25 December 2022
